entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near noon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 26 March 2023
